Verses: 1 naan Dhevanai Nokki En Saththaththai Uyarththik Kenjinen, En Saththaththai Dhevanidaththil Uyarththinen, Avar Enakkuch Sevikoduththaar.
2 en Aabaththunaalil Aandavaraith Thedinen; Iravilum En Kai Thalaraamal Virikkappattirundhadhu; En Aaththumaa Aarudhaladaiyaamarpoyitru.
3 naan Dhevanai Ninaiththapodhu Alarinen; Naan Dhiyaanikkumpodhu En Aavi Thoindhupoyitru. (selaa.)
4 naan Thoongaadhapadi En Kannimaigalaip Pidiththirukkireer; Naan Pesamaattaadhapadi Sanjalappadugiren.
5 poorvanaatkalaiyum, Aadhikaalaththu Varushangalaiyum Sindhikkiren.
6 raakkaalaththil En Sangeedhaththai Naan Ninaiththu, En Irudhayaththode Sambaashiththukkollugiren; En Aavi Aaraaichsicheydhadhu.
7 aandavar Niththiyakaalamaaith Thallividuvaaro? Ini Orupodhum Thayaiseyyaadhiruppaaro?
8 avarudaiya Kirubai Mutrilum Atruppoyitro? Vaakkuththaththamaanadhu Thalaimurai Thalaimuraikkum Ozhindhupoyitro?
9 dhevan Irakkanjeyya Marandhaaro? Kobaththinaale Thamadhu Urukkamaana Irakkangalai Adaiththukkondaaro? Endren. (selaa.)
10 appozhudhu Naan: Idhu En Balaveenam; Aanaalum Unnadhamaanavarudaiya Valadhukaraththilulla Varushangalai Ninaivukooruven.
11 karththarudaiya Seyalgalai Ninaivukooruven, Ummudaiya Poorvakaalaththu Adhisayangalaiye Ninaivukooruven;
12 ummudaiya Kiriyaigalaiyellaam Dhiyaaniththu, Ummudaiya Seyalgalai Yosippen Endren.
13 dhevane, Umadhu Vazhi Parisuththa Sthalaththilulladhu; Nammudaiya Dhevanaippolap Periya Dhevan Yaar?
14 adhisayangalaich Seygira Dhevan Neere; Janangalukkulle Ummudaiya Vallamaiyai Vilangappannineer.
15 yaakkobu Yoseppu Enbavargalin Puththiraraagiya Ummudaiya Janangalai, Umadhu Puyaththinaale Meettukkondeer. (selaa.)
16 jalangal Ummaik Kandadhu; Dhevane, Jalangal Ummaik Kandu Thaththaliththadhu; Aazhangalum Kalanginadhu.
17 megangal Jalangalaip Pozhindhadhu; Aagaayamandalangal Muzhakkamittadhu; Ummudaiya Ambugalum Therippundu Parandhadhu.
18 ummudaiya Kumuralin Saththam Suzhalkaatril Muzhanginadhu; Minnalgal Poochchakkaraththaip Piragaasippiththadhu; Boomi Kulungi Adhirndhadhu.
19 umadhu Vazhi Kadalilum, Umadhu Paadhaigal Thiranda Thanneergalilum Irundhadhu; Umadhu Kaaladigal Theriyappadaamarpoyitru.
20 mose Aaron Enbavargalin Kaiyaal, Umadhu Janangalai Oru Aattumandhaiyaippola Vazhinadaththineer.
